Cambridge City
MA

City Manager's Agenda Item
CMA 2025 #126
ORDER ADOPTED
May 19, 2025 5:30 PM

Transmitting Communication from Yi-An Huang, City Manager, relative to the appropriation of $5,000 to the Grant Fund Department of Human Service Programs Other Ordinary Maintenance account. These funds were awarded to the Summer Food Program by Project Bread and will be used to enhance promotion and outreach, support activities, and to pay for program related supplies.

Information

Department:City Manager's OfficeSponsors:
Category:Appropriation

Attachments

Version History
  1. Printout

Body

 

 

To the Honorable, the City Council:

 

I am hereby requesting the appropriation of the Project Bread Summer Eats grant in the amount of $5,000 to the Grant Fund Department of Human Service Programs Other Ordinary Maintenance account.

 

These funds were awarded to the Summer Food Program by Project Bread and will be used to enhance promotion and outreach, support activities, and to pay for program related supplies.

 

Very truly yours,

 

Yi-An Huang

City Manager

Meeting History

May 19, 2025 5:30 PM  City Council Regular Meeting
 Draft

AND CMA PLACED ON FILE

RESULT:ORDER ADOPTED [8 TO 0]
YEAS:Burhan Azeem, Marc C. McGovern, Patricia Nolan, Sumbul Siddiqui, Jivan Sobrinho-Wheeler, Ayesha M. Wilson, Catherine Zusy, E. Denise Simmons
ABSENT:Paul F. Toner
